thread.section_title: GameSeek Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.gameseek.co.uk | 9 of 278
thread.title: Celia

author: Celia
title: Celia
text: This was the first order I had placed with Gameseek. I phoned with a question and spoke to a very helpful lady. I placed the order online and paid a small amount extra for Hermes delivery. I received the item 2 days later and suspect that free delivery with Royal Mail might not have taken much longer. The price paid was the cheapest I found and I'm very pleased with the product. I would recommend Gameseek and wouldn't hesitate to order from them again.
